This article is about the spiritual successor to the original Horicraft server, for its predecessor, see Horicraft.

Horicraft (2)

Horicraft (2) was a survival Minecraft server owned & operated by Nekori founded on 14 March 2025 and closed on 18 May 2025. It is the spiritual successor to the original Horicraft server after being closed due to a disagreement between the server hoster and Nekori.

The server closed due to lack of interest in maintaining the server on Nekori’s side.

Trivia

This section contains a list of Horicraft (2) trivia

  • The server was originally gonna be hosted on another computer, before Nekori’s parents disallowed them.
  • Nekori and KayAurora were the first members of Horicraft (2), both joined shortly after the server was online for its first time. Nekori’s YouTube channel has a video of both playing in the server in its early days.
  • The seed for the Horicraft (2) world is theoneandonlycomet, referencing Nekori’s OC (Original Character), Comet.
  • Nekori’s house on the server is a direct remake of their Horicraft 1 house.
  • Horicraft (2)’s motd is “Horicraft (2): the return of Dogui Heavy Industries and Cairo Company”
  • Nekori’s title tag for the run-server-batch-script is “Run Horicraft (2): the return of Yoshito Hori”.
  • So far, Cairo Company HQ has been built, DHI HQ is yet to be build on the world.
  • In the NovaLand lore, the world where Horicraft (2) takes place is the Starlight district of Fucking.

Horicraft (2) is planned to close on May 18 or May 24 2025 to merge with the original Horicraft to a new Minecraft server operated by Nekori. This decision was made in order to revive both Horicraft projects after Nekori’s demotivation on keeping both alive.
